summary: Adopt the final “Open Architecture” masterplan: multi-page portal with Apple/Samsung/Microsoft-inspired premium aesthetics (parallax + liquid-motion animations, interactive 3D product cards, Bento-grid Achievements). Remove the signup/login barrier for Connect/Founders’ Vault—make all contact info publicly accessible and route Messaging Terminal submissions directly to tactic.transmit@gmail.com, while keeping existing admin authentication/dashboard intact.
architectural_notes: Portal uses a deep-tech glassmorphism UI style with dark gradient background and animated/pulsing status indicators.
Admin access requires authentication before displaying operational metrics (uptime, NTP status).
Typography: use Orbitron and JetBrains Mono as the primary site fonts.
Project direction: full rebuild to implement the provided deep-dive multi-page blueprint, overwriting existing page structures/content.
Connect & Support includes two zones: public contact form plus an authenticated secure-contact vault that reveals founder contact info after login.
Automated transactional email should be sent upon successful user registration to grant Tier 1 access to secure contact registry/docs.
Use the user-provided logo asset for branding; do not rely on AI-generated logo renders if a source logo is provided.
Do not use AI-generated founder portraits/headshots; Board page should be text-only with more detailed descriptions.
Branding constraint: use ONLY the user-uploaded logo asset across the site; do not use any AI-generated or other generated/placeholder logo renders.
Open architecture decision: remove signup/login barrier for Connect; make direct contact registry (phone/email/Instagram) publicly accessible.
known_issues: Scope conflict: earlier plan stated no external email delivery for contact form submissions, but latest masterplan requires Messaging Terminal submissions go directly to tactic.transmit@gmail.com—needs decision/implementation approach.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cinematic TT-1 assembly montage poster frame, dark high-contrast, premium product lighting (tt1-assembly-hero-poster.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Subtle seamless technical grid pattern tile, deep charcoal lines with faint neon-blue highlights (syncing-grid-tile.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public marketing landing page for “TACTIC TRANSMIT” that follows the specified deep-tech visual identity: dark charcoal-to-navy gradient background, glassmorphism (blurred semi-transparent panels), neon-blue accent pulses, and a circular “TT” logo in the header that softly pulses to indicate system vitality.

Implement the Hero section with the exact English headline and sub-headline text, and a visually animated background that evokes TT-1 circuitry with neon-blue pulses (implemented as a performant, non-blocking animation layer).

Add a “Product: The TT-1 Transmitter” section that includes a prominent 3D product render (static image render is acceptable) and a spec list with the exact four spec items provided (ESP Logic, Hi‑Fi DAC, Security Shield, Sync), using the exact English phrasing.
Add an “Executive Board” section as a clean, responsive grid showcasing the four founders with their names and roles using the exact English text provided.

Implement a “Connect Gateway” section containing a login panel labeled exactly “ADMINISTRATIVE ACCESS”. Authentication must use Internet Identity. After successful sign-in, route the user to an admin dashboard screen.

Create an admin dashboard that shows (1) Live Uptime and (2) NTP Status, sourced from backend canister APIs. Include a “direct line to the team for schedule updates” as a contact module (displaying contact instructions and a copy-to-clipboard address or identifier stored in backend configuration).
Add Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages and link them from the site footer. Include a footer status indicator that reads exactly: “SYSTEM: OPERATIONAL.” with a green indicator light style.
Add required generated static images to the frontend and render them in the UI (served from frontend/public/assets/generated, referenced directly by the frontend).

Add a responsive top navigation menu to the existing fixed header (frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx) that provides clear navigation to the existing routes: Home (/), Admin (/admin), Terms of Service (/terms), and Privacy Policy (/privacy). The menu must work on both desktop and mobile (e.g., collapse into a hamburger/dropdown on small screens) and preserve the current TT logo + title branding.

Update site-wide typography to use Orbitron and JetBrains Mono fonts. Orbitron must be used for display/brand typography (e.g., site title and headings), and JetBrains Mono must be used for monospace/technical text (and optionally body text if appropriate). Load both fonts in the frontend and wire them into Tailwind so they can be applied consistently across pages.

Update only the selected Hero headline element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]) so the H1 text is visually contained within its glass panel on all screen sizes (no overflow/cropping), by making the typography responsive and allowing safe wrapping within the box while keeping the existing headline text unchanged.

Restructure the public portal from a single long landing page into the blueprint’s interconnected multi-page site: Home, Product Deep-Dive, Board, Connect & Support, and Legal & Technical Docs, while keeping the existing Admin Dashboard route operational.

Rebuild the Home page (The Pulse) to match the blueprint content and interactions: a high-contrast dark mode experience with a mouse-reactive particle background layer; a cinematic 3D circular TT logo render that pulses in sync with an on-screen digital clock; the Hook headline exactly “PRECISION. AUTOMATED. SYNCHRONIZED.”; a Welcome Narrative section with the provided text and attribution; and a Core Value grid containing the three specified items.

Create a dedicated Product Deep-Dive page (The TT-1 Transmitter) with a technical schematic/blueprint visual style and four component modules, each showing a high-resolution macro image and the exact technical description text provided for: ESP32-WROOM-32, DS3231 High-Precision RTC, DFPlayer Mini (FN-M16P) + 24-bit DAC, and 1kΩ Impedance Matching Resistors.

Create a dedicated Board page (Executive Leadership) with glassmorphism cards and clean studio-style headshots for the four founders, using the exact names, roles, and descriptions provided in the blueprint.

Create a dedicated Connect & Support page split into two zones: (A) a public “Messaging Terminal” contact form with fields Name, Email Address (required), and Message; and (B) a secure “Founders’ Vault” area that is gated behind Internet Identity authentication and profile completion.

Implement backend persistence and admin access for “Messaging Terminal” submissions so that submitting the public contact form stores the message in the backend, and authenticated admins can retrieve a list of submissions for follow-up (no external email delivery required).

Replace the blueprint’s custom Name/Email/Password signup/login with Internet Identity-based “Sign up / Login” semantics: require Internet Identity authentication plus a stored user profile that includes Name and Email Address to unlock the Founders’ Vault secure contact details.

After successful secure access registration/unlock, present the provided “Automated Network Access Email” content as an in-app confirmation screen/modal that the user can copy (subject + body), since external email sending is not part of this build.

Implement the Founders’ Vault “Unlock” view to reveal the exact secure contact details after authentication: Official Phone +91 7356824245, Official Email tactic.transmit@gmail.com, Instagram @tactic_transmit.

Create a Legal & Technical Docs area that includes (1) an updated Terms of Service section explicitly defining the IP ownership of the four founders, and (2) a Safety Audit document page/section presented as a signed document by Dejon and Johann.

Update global navigation to match the blueprint’s footer navigation intent: include clear links for Home, Product, Board, and Login/Connect, and keep Terms/Privacy accessible from the footer (even if not in the primary nav).
Add explicit logout controls in the public portal navigation and/or Connect area so an authenticated user can clear the Internet Identity session and return to Home.
Add Home page contact details in a public section: display the email tactic.transmit@gmail.com and Instagram handle @tactic_transmit.

Add the user-uploaded logo image (SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp.jpg) to the frontend as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and use it as the primary brand/logo image across the public portal (header brand mark and home hero logo), replacing the currently-referenced generated logo images.

Update the Board page (Executive Leadership) to use no founder photos/images (do not use AI images for founders). Remove founder image rendering and make the Board/Executive Leadership section text-forward with more detailed written descriptions for each founder while preserving the existing founder names and roles.

Update the public portal UI to use only /assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg anywhere a TT/Tactic Transmit logo is rendered (including the fixed header brand mark and the Home hero logo), removing references to any other logo image filenames currently used.

Update the global header navigation to match the “Open Architecture” menu items and labels: “Experience” (route /), “The TT-1 Hardware” (route /product), “Leadership” (route /board), “Achievements” (new route /achievements), and “Connect” (route /connect), while preserving the existing frosted-glass/glassmorphism header styling and the existing logo usage.
Add a new Achievements page at route /achievements that presents a Microsoft-style Bento Grid (“Wall of Excellence”) with the four milestone tiles and exact English text provided in the masterplan.

Update the Connect page to remove the signup/login barrier: make all direct contact information immediately accessible (no Internet Identity authentication required) while keeping the Messaging Terminal form available publicly on the same page.

Resolve the Messaging Terminal “send to tactic.transmit@gmail.com” requirement without external email delivery by implementing a user-visible delivery workflow: on successful submission, store the message in the backend (as currently) and present a clear on-screen option to send via the user’s email client (mailto:) to tactic.transmit@gmail.com with subject/body prefilled from the form, plus copy-to-clipboard for the composed message.

Enhance the Home page (“Experience”) visual strategy to include a parallax scrolling feel and a subtle moving grid pattern background (“Syncing Infrastructure”) layered behind the existing hero content, while preserving the headline text exactly: “PRECISION. AUTOMATED. SYNCHRONIZED.”

Add the “Mission” line to the Home page as English text: “Bridging the gap between legacy school systems and the digital future of ARS.” and ensure the Brand Voice quote by Nandhu Krishna Biju is present in English on the Home page.

Update the Product Deep-Dive page (“The TT-1 Ecosystem”) to present the component breakdown using interactive, clickable 3D-style cards (Samsung-inspired) such that each component card can be clicked/tapped to reveal its detailed technical role text.

Update the Leadership page content to match the “Leadership & Mentorship” roster and descriptions from the masterplan, including adding “Jeswin Miss | Chief Institutional Mentor” and ensuring “Nandhu Krishna Biju | Ad Handler & Brand Strategist” uses the exact name spelling. Keep the page text-forward with no photos/images for people.

Update the global footer to match the Open Architecture navigation intent and status indicators: include footer links for Home, Technical Data, Achievements, and Terms of Service; display dual status indicators in English: “SYSTEM STATUS: ● OPERATIONAL” and “NETWORK: ● UNRESTRICTED”; and update the copyright line to: “© 2026 Tactic Transmit. All designs are the joint intellectual property of the Founders.”

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement deep-tech visual identity (dark charcoal/navy gradient, glassmorphism panels, pulsing circular TT logo in header)
Create hero section with headline/subheadline and animated looping background (TT-1 circuitry neon blue pulses)
Add product section featuring TT-1 Transmitter 3D render and key specs list (ESP logic, Hi-Fi DAC, Security Shield, NTP sync)
Build Executive Board grid showcasing founders with names and roles
Implement Connect Gateway with secure admin login and post-auth dashboard showing Live Uptime, NTP Status, and contact/schedule update channel
Add legal/footer sections including Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and a 'SYSTEM: OPERATIONAL' status indicator

Add backend administration controls with authorization: only approved admin principals can update dashboard status/config values (e.g., setting NTP status and contact info). Non-admin callers can read public status values but cannot modify them.
Add a site menu/navigation (header menu) to the public portal
Update typography to use Orbitron and JetBrains Mono fonts across the site
Ensure header/menu list links route correctly: Home -> / and each menu item navigates to its respective page (Product, Executive Board, Connect Gateway/Admin, Terms, Privacy)
Add a Logout option (clears Internet Identity session and returns user to Home)
Add a detailed 'About Us' section on the Home page
Add Contact details on the Home page including email (tactic.transmit@gmail.com) and Instagram (@tactic_transmit)

Full rebuild: replace existing portal pages and content with the provided deep-dive blueprint across Home, Product Deep-Dive, Board, Connect & Support, and Legal/Docs (interconnected multi-page structure)

Home page upgrades: mouse-reactive particle background, cinematic 3D pulsing TT logo synced with a digital clock element, add Hook headline and Welcome Narrative content, add Core Value grid (High Fidelity/Zero Drift/Safety First)

Product Deep-Dive page: technical schematic/blueprint visual style background; add component modules with high-res macro photos and detailed technical descriptions for ESP32-WROOM-32, DS3231 RTC, DFPlayer Mini + 24-bit DAC, and 1kΩ protection stage
Connect & Support page: implement public Messaging Terminal contact form (Name, required Email, Message) with routing logic to the team while preserving internal privacy
Legal & Technical Docs: add/expand Terms of Service (IP ownership for the four founders) and add a Safety Audit document page/section signed by Dejon and Johann
Global footer navigation update to match blueprint: links for Home, Product, Board, Login
Use the user-provided logo asset for the site branding/hero/logo areas, replacing any generated logo renders as needed
Remove/avoid AI-generated founder images on the Board/Executive Leadership area: use no founder photos and expand written founder descriptions instead

Add the newly uploaded logo image file (SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg) to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and treat it as the single source-of-truth logo asset.
Add an Achievements page/section (“Wall of Excellence”) using a Microsoft-style Bento grid of milestone tiles
Update Home page experience to include parallax scrolling, subtle moving grid background, and a cinematic TT‑1 hardware video/montage hero
Implement Product Deep‑Dive as interactive 3D cards/modules (clickable components revealing technical roles)
Update global nav/footer to include Achievements and show dual status indicators (e.g., SYSTEM OPERATIONAL + NETWORK ENCRYPTED/UNRESTRICTED)

Update backend access control for contact information so that retrieving the public contact information no longer requires Internet Identity authentication or a completed user profile (Open Architecture). Keep admin-only capability to update contact info unchanged.
